topbar.selfHosted: Self-hosted sur Synology NAS ⚡ React 19 + Vite

cv.bio_p1: My name is Stéphane, a 34-year-old software developer with nearly 10 years of experience in building modern web applications. I am proficient in both front-end and full-stack environments, with solid expertise in technologies such as Angular, React, Vue.js, and Node.js.
cv.bio_p2: Used to working with Agile / SCRUM methodologies in demanding environments, I quickly adapt to existing teams and infrastructures to remain operational and productive within short timeframes. Recently settled in Haute-Savoie, I am currently looking for a permanent position (CDI) in the Geneva / Annecy region, ideally within a structured environment focused on quality, performance, and development best practices.

resume.bac: Scientific Baccalaureate + Bachelor in Computer Science
resume.university: University of the Littoral Opal Coast
resume.edu_ulco: Training in programming, algorithms, and computer systems
resume.exp_kiliba_desc: Participated in the development of an automated marketing solution based on artificial intelligence and supervised learning algorithms.
resume.exp_freelance_desc: Assisted in the creation of SaaS tools and customized e-commerce solutions.
resume.exp_rdv_desc: Developed a comprehensive ERP system (operations, garage management, accounting).
resume.exp_neo_desc: Created intuitive museum touch terminals (Grand Nausicaa) to enhance visitor experience, including software development and on-site hardware installation.
resume.exp_innova_desc: Managed custom ERP development projects, designed e-commerce and showcase websites, and implemented accounting automations and connected tools.
resume.exp_mapo_desc: Created custom web interfaces, integrated UI/UX mockups, and optimized the web platform.
